channel.title: Whats up with www.dodian.com!
channel.description:
Hey guys,
Im a comman user of dodian but whats happened to the site, :| got any ideas. Last thing they had wrong with the site was the attack on IRC chat but thats nothing drastic. I hope the admin and winten (owner of dodian) are working hard to get it back up as we dont want to see another good server site die on us. I suppose we will just to have depend on mopar now :(.
Thanks,
Olie
known as rshadow on dodian.com olie on moparisthebest

item.title: Whats up with www.dodian.com!
item.dc:creator: @inevitable65 inevitable65
item.description:
@inevitable65 wrote:

[scar]program New;
var i :integer;

begin
For I:= 0 to 1000 do begin
writeln(‘Mopar is ‘+inttostr(i)+’ times better than Dodian’)
end;

writeln(‘Ok, I’‘m bored’)
writeln(‘I’‘ll just say mopar is infinity times infinity better!’)
writeln(‘script by SuperNewb, but then modified by KyleGut3’)
writeln(‘then modified again by inevitable65’)
end.

program New;
begin
end.[/scar]

i didint think infinity was enough or 500x either

Read full topic

[scar]begin
writeln(‘SuperNewb stinks at scripting!’)

item.title: Whats up with www.dodian.com!
item.dc:creator: @KyleGut3 KyleGut3
item.description:
@KyleGut3 wrote:

Tisk tisk tisk… lets see if we can shorten that coding, eh?
[scar]
program New;
var i :integer;

begin
For I:= 0 to 500 do begin
writeln(‘Mopar is ‘+inttostr(i)+’ times better than Dodian’)
end;

writeln(‘Ok, I’‘m bored’)
writeln(‘I’‘ll just say mopar is infinity times better!’)
writeln(‘script by SuperNewb, but then modified by KyleGut3’)
end.

[/scar]

foo.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats up with www.dodian.com!
item.dc:creator: @SuperNewb SuperNewb
item.description:
@SuperNewb wrote:

ronaldinho6kid, you need a reality check :rolleyes:
moparisthebest forums= (insert good stuff here)

[scar]
var
b,c :Integer;
procedure moparisthebest;
begin
writeln(‘Mopar is ‘+inttostr(b)+’ times better than Dodian’)
end;
begin
b:=0
c:=0
repeat
moparisthebest;
c:=b+1
until (c=500)
writeln(‘Ok, I’‘m bored’)
writeln(‘I’‘ll just say mopar is infinity times better!’)
writeln(‘script by SuperNewb!’)
end.
[/scar]

Read full topic
